summary.span: 包含支援 Windows Forms 和 WPF 控制項互通的類別。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間包含類別，可讓之間的互通性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. 當您使用類別，您可以裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]上的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]頁面，並[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-架構應用程式。When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 實作交互操作功能的兩個主要類別是和。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 使用的類別取決於您的控制項實作：Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 使用 類別時，您必須使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]頁面。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - 使用類別時，您必須使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]為基礎的應用程式。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
